summary: The misadventures of Attila and his band of barbarians as they take up arms against the Roman Empire in their native Milano.
cast: Diego Abatantuono|Rita Rusic|Angelo Infanti|Enrico Antonelli|Armando Marra|Franz Di Cioccio|Vincenzo Crocitti|Mauro Di Francesco|Francesco Salvi|Tony Kendall|Iris Peynado|Toni Ucci|Elsa Vazzoler|Anna Kanakis|Mario Pedone|Giuseppe Castellano|Armando Celso|Franco Diogene|Alfio Patan√©|Angelo Susani|Massimo Pittarello|Tiberio Murgia|Flavio Baccianini|Diego Cappuccio|Paolo Rita Brazzali|Antonella Pezzi|Jimmy il Fenomeno
director: Directors: Franco Castellano (as Castellano), Giuseppe Moccia (as Pipolo)
title: Attila flagello di Dio
